inclusion.criterion: Indication of treatment with a carotid revascularization procedure (conventional surgery or angioplasty and stent)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Acceptance to participate in the protocol
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Associated retinal ophthalmological pathology: diabetic retinopathy, age-related macular degeneration, retinal vein occlusion, CRSC (Central serous chorioretinopathy)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Refusal to participate in the study
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Not affiliated to a social security scheme
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has severe stenosis in the left internal carotid artery and moderate stenosis in the right internal carotid artery, which may require treatment with a carotid revascularization procedure. However, there is no indication of associated retinal ophthalmological pathology or refusal to participate in the study.
